homework2

Class Channel

  • java.lang.Object
    • homework2.Channel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulatable<java.lang.String>

    public class Channel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Simulatable<java.lang.String>
    A channel is a pipe in a bipartite graph That transfers transactions between participants. The channel has a capacity of transcation's value that it can hold at a specific time. The class also implements Simulatable so that every simulation round allows the channel to transfer it's transactions to the following participant (which is a pipe).
